meanings.definition: Lacking stiffness or firmness; flexible or limp.
meanings.sent1: The floppy hat was the floppiest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's ears were the floppiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The floppy balloon looked like the floppiest jellyfish in the sea.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, usually so sleek, now hung floppiest around her face.
meanings.sent5: The old book's cover was the floppiest, showing years of use.

meanings.definition: Most floppy or droopy in form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The elephant's ears were the floppiest feature on its body.
meanings.sent2: The clown's oversized shoes were the floppiest part of his costume.
meanings.sent3: The floppy pizza slice looked like the floppiest hat I had ever seen.
meanings.sent4: The tree branches swayed in the wind, looking floppiest in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The fabric of the hammock was the floppiest, making it perfect for lounging.
